metadata.title: CVE-2024-30260 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Undici is an HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js. Undicicleared Authorization and Proxy-Authorization headers for `fetch()`, butdid not clear them for `undici.request()`. This vulnerability was patchedin version(s) 5.28.4 and 6.11.1.

criterions.comment: node-undici package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
node-undici package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
